job.title: Developer I - Software Engineering
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Role Proficiency<br><br></u></strong><strong>Job Description<br><br></strong>Acts under continuous guidance and support develop test and document applications<br><br><strong><u>Outcomes<br></u></strong><ul><li> Interpret the applications features and component design developing the same in accordance with user stories/ specifications per directions provided</li><li> Code debug test. document and communicate product/component/feature development stages. </li><li> Identify and report opportunities to improve efficiency and quality (e.g. repeatable processes that can be automated)</li><li> Adhere to project timelines and communicate effectively over e-mails and conversations</li><li> Conduct unit testing to validate unit level functionalities</li><li> Practice FAST goals; seek and accept feedback</li><li> Learn technology business domain system domain individually and as recommended by the project/account<br></li></ul><strong><u>Measures Of Outcomes<br></u></strong><ul><li> Adherence to engineering process and standards (coding standards)</li><li> Adherence to schedule / timelines</li><li> Adherence to SLAs where applicable</li><li> Number of defects post delivery</li><li> Number of non-compliance issues</li><li> Reduction of reoccurrence of known defects</li><li> Quickly turnaround production bugs</li><li> Meet the Defined productivity standards for project</li><li> Completion of all mandatory training requirements<br></li></ul><strong><u>Code<br><br></u></strong>Outputs Expected:<br><ul><li>Learn coding standards and practice them in development. Develop code with guidance for the above<br></li></ul><strong><u>Configure<br></u></strong><ul><li>Follow configuration process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Test<br></u></strong><ul><li>Create and conduct unit testing</li><li>Document test results<br></li></ul><strong><u>Domain Relevance<br></u></strong><ul><li>Develop features and components with good understanding of the business problem being addressed for the client<br></li></ul><strong><u>Manage Defects<br></u></strong><ul><li>Raise fix retest defects<br></li></ul><strong><u>Document<br></u></strong><ul><li>Create documentation for one's own work<br></li></ul><strong><u>Status Reporting<br></u></strong><ul><li>Report status of tasks assigned</li><li>Comply with project related reporting standards/process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Manage Knowledge<br></u></strong><ul><li>Consume project related documents share point libraries and client universities <br></li></ul><strong><u>Release<br></u></strong><ul><li>Adhere to release management process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirement<br></u></strong><ul><li>Understand the requirements/user stories<br></li></ul><strong><u>Design<br></u></strong><ul><li>Understand the design/LLD and link it to requirements/user stories<br></li></ul><strong><u>Skill Examples<br></u></strong><ul><li> Explain and communicate the design / development to the mentors/leads </li><li> Perform and evaluate test results against product specifications</li><li> Develop user interfaces business software components and embedded software components</li><li> Manage and guarantee high levels of cohesion and quality</li><li> Use data models</li><li> Perform and evaluate tests in the customer or target environment</li><li> Team player</li><li> Good written and verbal communication abilities</li><li> Proactively ask for and offer help <br></li></ul><strong><u>Knowledge Examples<br><br></u></strong>Additional Comments:<br><br>None
